subtasks: Gather materials (hoe, urine, EM, 20 kg rich soil, 20 kg dried manure, 20 kg biochar)
Find a flat, hard surface and cover with plastic
Spread biochar on plastic and add urine
Apply dried manure and more urine
Add soil and more urine to the pile
Mix ingredients together until saturated with urine
Sprinkle EM solution over the mix while mixing
Cover the finished mix and create a trench around it
Wait three months for the fertilizer to熟化 (ripen)
Apply the biochar fertilizer to crops
Monitor plants for growth and health
